narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Re-License inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. The applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
 
This site is determined to be in compliance. All sites used for regulated activity must demonstrate full compliance with the 
Animal Welfare Act prior to issuance of a license. Regulated activity may continue at all regulated sites until expiration of 
the current license. At that time, conducting regulated activity from any site without a valid USDA license is a violation of 
the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
Once all sites have demonstrated full compliance, a copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action 
on your part. If you have not received your license within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478. 
 
End Section
